text: San Marcos is a department in northwestern Guatemala. The capital is the city of San Marcos. It is on the Pacific Ocean and along the western Guatemala- Mexico border. == Municipalities == # Ayutla # Catarina # Comitancillo # Concepción Tutuapa # El Quetzal # El Rodeo # El Tumbador # Esquipulas Palo Gordo # Ixchiguan # La Blanca # La Reforma # Malacatán # Nuevo Progreso # Ocos # Pajapita # Río Blanco # San Antonio Sacatepéquez # San Cristóbal Cucho # San José Ojetenam # San Lorenzo # San Marcos # San Miguel Ixtahuacán # San Pablo # San Pedro Sacatepéquez # San Rafael Pie de la Cuesta # Sibinal # Sipacapa # Tacaná # Tajumulco # Tejutla Category:Departments of Guatemala
title: San Marcos Department
